core_values.answer: Values: honesty, hard work, lifelong learning. Trust easily, help others, share technical knowledge.

personality_description.answer: Traits: energetic, friendly, optimistic, competitive. Can seem shy if you dont know me. Not great at public speaking. Calm, patient, dedicated, very hard working, always seem to find a solution for any problem I encounter

hobbies_interests.answer: Activities: CrossFit, running marathons, played classical piano. Interests: board games, chess, designing (ex-architect), timber interior projects. Time with wife Sanri & golden retriever Travis.

handling_stress.answer: Copes with stress through training. Physical exercise for clarity and helps to reduce stress. Keeps cool under pressure.

memorable_experiences.answer: Learnings: persistence from piano, masters in architecture, passion for design. Shifted to Computer Science. Married Sanri van Renssen, 19 March 2022.

strengths_weaknesses.answer: Strengths: logical thinking, out-of-box solutions, performs under pressure, fast learning, multitasking. Improvement areas: public speaking, admin, cleaning.
